summary: The diff implements all 11 requirements (REQ-23 through REQ-33) for worker verification badges, employer favorites, job templates, availability calendar, and job reminders. Backend includes migration system for badge data, new data models (BadgeLevel, VerifiedWorker, JobTemplate, DayAvailability, JobReminders), and API methods. Frontend includes components for badges, favorites, calendars, notifications, and new pages for templates, availability, notifications, and favorites management. All required images are referenced in components.
